tasks.title: CRITICAL FIX: Task-Context Status Alignment Validation
tasks.description: Fix critical issue where next_task cannot progress when task status and context status are misaligned
tasks.details:
**CRITICAL ISSUE RESOLVED:**
The next_task functionality was failing to progress when tasks and subtasks were marked as "done" but their context status didn't match, causing the AI to get stuck.

**ROOT CAUSE:**
DoNextUseCase only checked task.status but ignored context.metadata.status, leading to:
- Tasks marked "done" in task system but "in_progress" in context
- AI unable to move to next available tasks
- Workflow blocking without clear error messages

**IMPLEMENTATION:**
‚úÖ Added `_validate_task_context_alignment()` method
‚úÖ Validates task status matches context status before determining actionable tasks
‚úÖ Detects and reports specific mismatches with fix suggestions
‚úÖ Checks for tasks marked "done" with incomplete subtasks in context
‚úÖ Provides actionable error messages with suggested commands

**KEY FEATURES:**
- **Status Mismatch Detection**: Identifies when task.status ‚â† context.metadata.status
- **Subtask Validation**: Ensures "done" tasks don't have incomplete subtasks in context
- **Actionable Errors**: Provides specific commands to fix mismatches
- **Graceful Fallback**: Continues operation even if individual context checks fail
- **Detailed Diagnostics**: Shows exactly what needs to be fixed and how

**ERROR RESPONSE FORMAT:**
```json
{
  \"has_next\": false,
  \"context\": {
    \"error_type\": \"status_mismatch\",
    \"mismatches\": [
      {
        \"task_id\": \"123\",
        \"title\": \"Task Title\",
        \"task_status\": \"done\",
        \"context_status\": \"in_progress\",
        \"fix_action\": \"Update context status...\",
        \"suggested_command\": \"manage_context(...)\"
      }
    ],
    \"fix_required\": true
  },
  \"message\": \"‚ùå CRITICAL: Found X task(s) with mismatched status...\"
}
```

**IMPACT:**
- ‚úÖ Prevents next_task from getting stuck on misaligned tasks
- ‚úÖ Provides clear error messages for AI to understand and fix issues
- ‚úÖ Ensures workflow can progress once status alignment is corrected
- ‚úÖ Maintains data integrity between task and context systems
